product_spec: This product needs to be assembled.
misc_info: The final mobile suit used by Amuro Ray featured in Char's Counterattack will be available as an RG kit. It includes a multi-link gimmick that allows armor parts to slide simultaneously with the articulation of the leg, as well as armor unfolding gimmick through the body based on a thorough investigation of actual machines, resulting in a product with condensed details unique to RG kits.

product_spec: This product needs to be assembled.
misc_info:
• Mobile Suit Gundam 00 the Movie: Awakening of the Trailblazer's 00 QAN[T] is now available in RG!
  • Realistic features borrowed from modern engineering include GN Drive mounts and an expanding shield.
  • Its newly-designed arms use Advanced MS Joints just like the RG Exia, and it also comes equipped with GN Condensers.
  • Its “bits” can be modified, with the GN Sword V displayable in either Bastard Sword or Buster Rifle mode.

product_spec: This product needs to be assembled.
misc_info:
• Adopted the inner frame system "The Advanced MS Joint."
  • Inner frames and outer armor move relative to each other, just like real human.
  • The finely color-coded parts can express the shades without painting.
  • Luster of metal can be expressed with realistic decals.
  • Includes various marking stickers.
  • The Japanese sword "Gerbera Straight" is silver color plated. The pattern on the blade is also reproduced.
  • Includes a beam rifle, beam sabers and a shield.
  • Runner x9, Realistic decal x1, Instruction manual x1

product_spec: This product needs to be assembled.
misc_info:
• Strike Freedom Gundam joins the RG series of MS Gundam SEED which has already launched Aile Strike Gundam, Freedom Gundam, Justice Gundam and Destiny Gundam.
  • Plated parts are applied for the inside of the wings.
  • Easy assembling and wide range of motion are achieved by advanced MS joints.
  • Pursues the reality by the thorough study on Strike Freedom. The spreading and folding gimmicks of the weapon wings are designed based on the concept of actual machine settings.
  • Realistic decals add reality on the texture as if it were made of real metals.
  • The gold frames, one of the characteristics of Strike Freedom Gundam, are re-created by molded color.
  • The beam shield is re-created by a clear material.
  • The long-range beam rifle can be re-created by connecting two beam rifles.
  • Runner x8, Realistic decal x1, Instruction manual x1

• From "Mobile Suit Gundam 0083," RX-78GP01, code name: Zephyranthes, is added to the RG series.
  • Details unique to RG express the reality of the mobile suits.
  • The distinctive Core Block System and the transformation of Core Fighter 2 are recreated.
  • "Advanced MS joint 5," which has improved movable area of RG RX-78-2 Gundam, is adopted.
  • Includes a beam rifle and a shield with details specially added for RG.
  • runner x9, realistic decal x1, instruction manual x1

• The main MS of "Mobile Suit Gundam SEED DESTINY" appears.
  • The advanced MS joint system is adopted. The distinctive mid-air poses of SEED can be recreated.
  • The armor is divided minutely to recreate the setting of MS.
  • The realistic decals express the metallic texture on the joints.
  • The distinctive wings are recreated.
  • The gimmicks of spreading wings on weapons can be recreated.
  • Various weapons are included such as a long-range beam cannon and a beam shield.
  • runner x9, realistic decal x1, tetron sticker(for shield) x1 instruction manual x1

• MSZ-006 Zeta Gundam appears as the 10th RG model Kit.
  • The newly adopted "advanced MS joints" enable to expand the range of motion.
  • Many gimmicks of the RG "real system" can be found such as the opening and closing of the cockpit hatch and more.
  • 13 runner, realistic decal, and instruction manual

You don’t need cement.

Recommended for 15 years & up

• FATUM-00 (Backpack) can be attached/detached and is condensed into 1/144 scale.
  • The fixation structure is mounted for stable connection of FATUM-00.
  • The display support parts to keep FATUM-00 in a horizontal position are included.
  • The detachable shoulder parts express the beam boomerang.
  • Open hands can recreate the Anime Freedom/Justice hand holding sequence.
  • Comes with a stand that holds Phantom 00 in the air.
  • RG slide gimmick adapted to enable of mounting the cannon on the shoulders.
  • Weapons: Beam Saber, Beam Boomerang, Shield, Beam Rifle, and Interchangeable Hands.
  • Comes with 11 runners, RG Real Sticker / Decal, and Instruction Manual.

product_spec: This product needs to be assembled.
misc_info:
• Freedom Gundam, the main MS of "Mobile Suit Gundam SEED", appears in the RG series.
  • The forms of its wings are designed on the basis of investigation of real machines, and new frames improve their movability
  • The "Lupus" beam rifle can be attached to the shield and has a removable stock.
  • The beam of the Lacerta beam saber is recreated with transparent parts, and the saber can be worn at the waist.
  • The Laminate anti beam shield can be mounted to the arms.
  • You can recreate both the high mat mode and the full burst mode.
  • Realistic decals improve kit's visual quality.
  • 9 runners complete with advanced MS joint system, 1 realistic decal sheet, and instruction manual.

// RG Aile Strike Gundam Promotion Video //
<iframe allowfullscreen="" frameborder="0" height="390" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Q94PwTqM0qg" width="640"></iframe>
// Product Detail //

• Aile Strike Gundam joins in the RG series as the third model of the new series in celebration of the Gunpla 30th anniversary.
  • The "Advanced MS joints" system improves the kit’s movable performance.
  • The "Realistic Decal" feature gives the details metal texture for extra realism.
  • Multi colored outer parts develop the model’s appeal.
  • Includes 1/144 figures of Kira Yamato standing and sitting.

product_spec: This product needs to be assembled.
misc_info:
• As the second model of new series celebrating of the Gunpla 30th anniversary, Char’s Zaku appears with the "Real System."
  • The design is created on the assumption of 1/1 scale.
  • Adopted the "Advanced MS joints" which have new assembling process of inner structure.
  • The "Realistic Decal" system has luster like metal which is difficult to express by paint.
  • The color coding is excellent compared to any other 1/144 scale model.
  • The "Advanced MS joints" are designed to recreate the astounding movements of Char's Zaku. They have the widest range of movement in the history of Gunpla.
  • By the adoption of “Touch gate,” the pipes are easily assembled.

product_spec: This product needs to be assembled.
misc_info:
• A new series, REAL GRADE (RG), rolls out in July 2010. This is a new brand of plastic model kit that pursues realistic representation with the latest technology for all those who know Gundam. A highly detailed model that has dynamic action and gimmicks. A pre-constructed inner frame makes assembly stress-free.
  • All the features of the RX-78-2 Gundam are consolidated into the 125mm tall body.
  • Having an inner frame with the "Advanced MS Joint" makes it possible to move dynamically with fewer parts.
  • Comes with the "Realistic Decal" feature that pursues reality with special decal material.
  • 10 Runners, 1 Realistic decal sheet, Instruction manual
